item.title: elementary OS: Things to do after installation
item.content:encoded:
elementary OS

Install elementary OS with full disk encryption.

Install update manager

sudo apt update
sudo apt install update-manager

elementary OS 7

Install elementary with full disk encryption

Install update manager
sudo apt update  
sudo apt install update-manager

code block 1

sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade -y && sudo apt-get dist-upgrade -y &&  sudo apt-get autoremove -y && sudo apt-get autoclean -y

code block 2

sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade -y && sudo apt-get dist-upgrade -y && sudo apt-get autoremove -y && sudo apt-get autoclean -y
